Class SimpleFormComponent

  • BBjWidget
    • AbstractBCBoundWidget
      • SimpleFormComponent

  • public class SimpleFormComponent
extends AbstractBCBoundWidget
implements IPersistentState
    See Also:

      The constructor that creates the widget on wnd!

      voidsetQuickSearchFieldName(String quickSearchField!)

      default is "_SEARCH"

      voidsetQuickSearchUseWildCard(Boolean useWildCard!)

      default is TRUE

      voidsetStateChangeCallback(String methodName!, CustomObject callable!)

      the widget will call this method to register itself for statechanges of the component the method should set a callback which should call the method 'methodName' on 'callable!' whenever the state changed Event should be BBjCustomEvent.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleFormComponent

        public SimpleFormComponent(BBjWindow wnd!)

      • SimpleFormComponent

        public SimpleFormComponent(BBjWindow wnd!, BBjInt id!, BBjInt x!, BBjInt y!, BBjInt w!, BBjInt h!)

        The constructor that creates the widget on wnd!

        Parameters:
        BBjWindow wnd!: parent window
        BBjInt id: the control ID
        BBjInt x: x-location
        BBjInt y: y-location
        BBjInt w: width
        BBjInt h: height

        public void applyState(String state!)

        this method will be called to apply the state given by the widget

        Parameters:
        state! state string with the state which was stored by the widget

      • redraw

        public void redraw(Boolean f_init!)

        @Override This method is called whenever the widget needs to be rendered

        Parameters:
        Boolean f_init!: if TRUE the control is rendered for the first time so this method has to perform initial rendering

      • retrieveState

        public String retrieveState()

        this method will provide the widget with the current state of the component. the widget will store this data for later retrieval

      • setStateChangeCallback

        public void setStateChangeCallback(String methodName!, CustomObject callable!)

        the widget will call this method to register itself for statechanges of the component the method should set a callback which should call the method 'methodName' on 'callable!' whenever the state changed Event should be BBjCustomEvent.
